instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 wont boot
threads.message:
Hello,

I have 2014 820-3437 motherboard that won't boot.
It turn ons and loads loading bar to full and then stucks.

I seem that someone was messing with bios. Found solder balls around bios chip.

Tried new bios with clean me but still wont turn on fully.
( Found bios on internet so no idea if that file was any good)

Any ideas? maybe someone can upload know got bios with clean me.

Thanks.

threads.title: 820-3437 wont boot
threads.message:
Try this one.
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_vUaRGjasq1rYvM6pfckGOvb-ljLB7FT[/url]
Don't change SSN, just for test.
If works, SSN can be changed after...

threads.title: 820-3437 wont boot
threads.message: You should change SSN to your original now.
